# parentWindow

**Instance Property**

The window that displays the dashboard.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBOutlet @MainActor weak var parentWindow: NSWindow? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property before presenting a view controller. The window must be at least 800 x 600.
title: parentWindow
